content.text:
# List of World War II aces from Germany: T–Z

This is a list of fighter aces in World War II from Germany with their surname starting from T to Z. A flying ace or fighter ace is a military aviator credited with shooting down five or more enemy aircraft during aerial combat. Aces are listed alphabetically by last name.
Aces
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 183-2007-1218-500, Gerhard Thyben.jpg|Gerhard Thyben, 157 claims
File:Willy Unger (cropped).jpg|Willy Unger, 22 heavy bombers
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 101I-533-0006-14, Pilot mit Ritterkreuz und Schwimmweste.jpg|Heinz Vinke, night fighter pilot
File:Theodor Weissenberger.jpg|Theodor Weissenberger, 206 claims
File:Bundesarchiv Bild 146-1986-013-04, Helmut Wick (cropped).jpg|Helmut Wick, the leading Luftwaffe fighter pilot when killed in action
File:Josef Zwernemann portrait.jpg|Josef Zwernemann, 126 claims
By surname:
A–F  G–L  M–P  Q–S
